definition: to fall and fracture (a leg, vertebra etc)
to fall/to tumble/to trip/(of prices etc) to drop/Taiwan pr. [die2]
to break/to snap/to cut off/to give up or abstain from sth/to judge/(usu. used in the negative) absolutely/definitely/decidedly

sentences.english: I slipped on the icy road and broke my right leg.
sentences.chinese: 我在結冰的路上滑了一跤，跌斷了右腿。

sentences.english: Josh broke a bone when he fell off his bicycle.
sentences.chinese: 喬希從自行車上摔了下來，跌斷了一根骨頭。
